entries.name: new(ts, addresses=[Socket::INADDR_ANY], port=Ring_PORT)
entries.desc: Advertises ts on the given addresses at port.

entries.name: do_reply()
entries.desc: Pulls lookup tuples out of the TupleSpace and sends their DRb object the address of the local TupleSpace.

entries.name: do_write(msg)
entries.desc: Extracts the response URI from msg and adds it to TupleSpace where it will be picked up by reply_service for notification.

entries.name: reply_service()
entries.desc: Creates a thread that notifies waiting clients from the TupleSpace.

entries.name: write_services()
entries.desc: Creates threads that pick up UDP packets and passes them to #do_write for decoding.
